note.p: Education: Leyden; MD (1679); King's College, Cambridge; MD (Lit. Reg. 1681)
Career: Expelled from the Royal Society (1685); naturalised British (1698); practised in London and later moved out of town; did translation and compilation work for booksellers
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Venn; Hunter; Shaw LD
References: J H Appleby, 'The founding of St Petersburg in the context of the Royal Society's relationship with Russia' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 273-284
